column4: I repeat! What are the advantages of dual booting a windows os and ubuntu os? I have the ubuntu live cd, and I like it.... I suppose I'd just like to mess around with it the os, simply because I'd like to introduce myself to linux...  But I suppose I don't understand why I'd want to dual boot them both from my hard-drive.
Try getting SPSS to run in linux ;-)
the thousands of free apps? The control you get over your system?
